scripts.prereport: rm -rf cypress/results/*.json || true; npm run allure:clear
scripts.allure:clear: rm -rf allure-results/*;rm -rf allure-results-aggregated-files/*;rm -rf  allure-report/*; rm -rf cypress/screenshots/*; rm -rf  cypress/videos/*
scripts.cypress: npm run allure:clear;npx cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/tests/Examples/PIM.cy.ts --env allure=true;npm run allure:report
scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.gazaSkyGeeks: npx cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/tests/Admin/employeeTable.spec.cy.ts --env allure=true;npm run allure:report
